page.title: 11A LARGE CITY POST OFFICE
page.content: Leek Road General Post Office is situated on the A52 near to the centre of Stoke town and Stoke Railway Station.It is twenty two years old and employs four hundred and twenty people who work shifts twenty four hours a day.It is the City's main sorting office and this Post Office handles each year sixty two million letters, one million packets and one million parcels.The postmen deliver letters, packets and parcels up to six miles from the post office.The heaviest parcel that a postman can carry on a walk is twenty five kilograms. The post office offers the full range of postal services.The counter service to the public is run as a separate department to the sorting office behind.Many local people find the postage stamp vending machine outside the post office to be a useful amenity.
